section.title: Introduction
section.p: There are many different ways to create respectively import content into a Content Management System. You can upload an image, you can create a document based on some form input or you can create a document by copying a sample document. The following use cases shall illustrate some possible situations in more detail. The goal is to develop a generic API for resource creation.

ol.li: Go to the section page (e.g. International Section)
Click in the File Menu on "New Article"
Confirm by clicking ok on the "Create new article" screen
Sample article with all required elements will be copied onto a new article, where identifier has been created automatically based on the current date
Author/Editor will be redirected to newly created Article
The system inserts in the background the newly created article at the top of the refered section page
Go to the section page (e.g. Gesundheit)
Click in the File Menu on "New Article"
On the "Create new article" screen enter an identifier (based on Filemaker ID)
Sample article with all required elements will be copied onto a new article with the identifier entered by the editor
The system inserts the newly created article at the top of the refered section page
Author/Editor will be redirected back to the refered section page
Go to the article page
Click on a "new image" icon for instance between two paragraphs
On the "Upload new image" screen click on "browse" in order to select an image from your local harddisk. Enter a filename as name for the image on the server. Click "upload image".
The system stores the image "beside" the refered article and creates a meta file (XML) for the image with fields such as "Creation Date", User", "Filename", "Mime-Type", etc.
The system inserts an XInclude into the article (for instance between two paragraphs) referencing the meta file
The user will be redirected to the refered article
Click on "Submit Story" in the main navigation on the left hand side. You will be redirected to a form.
Complete the form (e.g. title, lead, text, category, etc.).
Submit the form and you will be redirected to a preview
Confirm the Preview or edit the form once again.
After confirming the preview, the User/Author will be redirected to a "Thank you" screen.
The systems adds the new story to the list of submitted stories (submissions list) and notifies the appropriate editors via email.
